root.title: 5 Bichiktoo-Bum III
root.place: The inscription is found on south district of village Bichiktoo-Bum of Ongudai region.
root.general: The inscription is on small rock face with size 65 x 52 cm, faced to south at almost foot of the mountain. The index of inscription in «Drevnetjurkskii slovar» - A8.
root.description: Consists of two vertical lines. 35 characters make up the left line, 3 characters taken out parallel.
root.size: Height of characters is from 1 to 3 cm.
root.investigation: Sabaeva found in end of 1950s. Seydakmatov studied on place in 1964, Ubriyatova in 1966, Vasiliyev in 1980, Kyzlasov in 1994, Nevskaya and Tybykova in 2003-2005 527, Kocheev 523. Attempt to read is made by Seydakmatov, Tenishev, Ubriyatova, Kyzlasov.

pdf.f_title: Свод древнетюркских рунических памятников Горного Алтая. Горно-Алтайск: АКИН, 2006. – 52 с.

refs.ref: Кызласов И.Л. Рунические письменности евразийских степей.-М. 1994.-С. 318.-Рис. 18.
